title: If my house is infested with German cockroaches (I rent the house), is that a health code violation? I live in New Hanover County (but not in Wilmington city limits) and am wondering if I should call New Hanover County Code Enforcement to report a zoning/building code violation? The owner and property management company are ignoring the infestation. I have children and the roaches are very unsanitary.
